titleStmt.title: Ελληνικό κοινοβουλευτικό σώμα κειμένου ParlaMint-GR-en, συνεδρίαση ΡΛΒ [ParlaMint-en.ana SAMPLE]
Greek parliamentary corpus ParlaMint-GR-en, session 132 [ParlaMint-en.ana SAMPLE]
Πρακτικά της ολομέλειας του ελληνικού κοινοβουλίου, κοινοβουλευτική περίοδος ΙΖ, σύνοδος Β, συνεδρίαση ΡΛΒ, 2017-06-09
Minutes of the assembly of the greek parliament, Term 17, session 2, sitting 132, 2017-06-09

respStmt.resp: Machine translation to English and linguistic analysis of the translation
Annotating MTed corpora with USAS semantic tags

availability.p: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License .
Το παρόν έργο διέπεται από την άδεια Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License .

bibl.title: Minutes of the assembly of the greek parliament, 2017-06-09
Πρακτικά της ολομέλειας του ελληνικού κοινοβουλίου, 2017-06-09

projectDesc.p: ParlaMint is a project that aims to (1) create a multilingual set of comparable corpora of parliamentary proceedings uniformly encoded according to the ParlaMint encoding guidelines, covering the period from 2015 to mid-2022; (2) add linguistic annotations to the corpora and machine-translate them to English; (3) make the corpora available through concordancers; and (4) build use cases in Political Sciences and Digital Humanities based on the corpus data.

prefixDef.p: Private URIs with this prefix point to aligned source elements of the MTed corpus.

div.head: ΠΡΑΚΤΙΚΑ ΒΟΥΛΗΣ
ΙΖ ΠΕΡΙΟΔΟΣ

ΣΥΝΟΔΟΣ Β
ΣΥΝΕΔΡΙΑΣΗ ΡΛΒ
Παρασκευή 9 Ιουνίου 2017

gap.desc: The frontmatter of the document has been removed

div.note: Athens, today, June 9, 2017, Friday morning 9.58', the House met in the Chamber of Parliament's sittings in plenary to meet under the chairmanship of its fourth Vice President, Mr. Nikita Kaklamanis.

u.note: Note: The following table of contents is not the final text because rationalisation and editorial corrections are pending
